pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this POKéMON is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.description: There is a plant bulb on its back. When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said to blossom into a large flower.

pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.description: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.description: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

pokemon.name: Charmeleon
pokemon.description: It lashes about with its tail to knock down its foe. It then tears up the fallen opponent with sharp claws.

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.description: Its wings can carry this POKéMON close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

pokemon.name: Wartortle
pokemon.description: This POKéMON is very popular as a pet. Its fur-covered tail is a symbol of its longevity.

pokemon.name: Blastoise
pokemon.description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

pokemon.name: Caterpie
pokemon.description: It is covered with a green skin. When it grows, it sheds the skin, covers itself with silk, and becomes a cocoon.

pokemon.name: Metapod
pokemon.description: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a harsh attack.

pokemon.name: Butterfree
pokemon.description: The wings are protected by rain-repellent dust. As a result, this POKéMON can fly about even in rain.

pokemon.name: Weedle
pokemon.description: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.

pokemon.name: Kakuna
pokemon.description: This POKéMON is in a temporary stage while making its body. It is almost completely unable to move on its own.

pokemon.name: Beedrill
pokemon.description: May appear in a swarm. Flies at violent speeds, all the while stabbing with the toxic stinger on its rear.

pokemon.name: Pidgey
pokemon.description: Does not like to fight. It hides in tall grass and so on, foraging for food such as small bugs.

pokemon.name: Pidgeotto
pokemon.description: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an EXEGGCUTE to its nest over 60 miles away.

pokemon.name: Pidgeot
pokemon.description: It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate enemies. It races through the skies at Mach-2 speed.

pokemon.name: Rattata
pokemon.description: Its fangs are long and very sharp. They grow continuously, so it gnaws on hard things to whittle them down.

pokemon.name: Raticate
pokemon.description: Its rear feet have three toes each. They are webbed, enabling it to swim across rivers.

pokemon.name: Spearow
pokemon.description: It busily flits around here and there. Even if it is frail, it can be a tough foe that uses MIRROR MOVE.

pokemon.name: Fearow
pokemon.description: Its huge and magnificent wings can keep it aloft in the sky. It can remain flying a whole day without landing.

pokemon.name: Ekans
pokemon.description: A very common sight in grassland, etc. It flicks its tongue in and out to sense danger in its surroundings.

pokemon.name: Arbok
pokemon.description: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.description: It has small electric sacs on both its cheeks. If threatened, it looses electric charges from the sacs.

pokemon.name: Raichu
pokemon.description: Its electric charges can reach even 100,000 volts. Careless contact can cause even an Indian elephant to faint.

pokemon.name: Sandshrew
pokemon.description: It burrows and lives underground. If threatened, it curls itself up into a ball for protection.

pokemon.name: Sandslash
pokemon.description: It is adept at attacking with the spines on its back and its sharp claws while quickly scurrying about.

pokemon.name: Nidoran ♀
pokemon.description: Though small, it must be treated with caution because of its powerfully toxic barbs. The female has smaller horns.

pokemon.name: Nidorina
pokemon.description: The female has a gentle temperament. It emits ultrasonic cries that have the power to befuddle foes.

pokemon.name: Nidoqueen
pokemon.description: The body is covered by stiff, needle-like scales. If it becomes excited, the needles bristle outwards.

pokemon.name: Nidoran ♂
pokemon.description: Its large ears are flapped like wings when it is listening to distant sounds. It extends toxic barbs when angered.

pokemon.name: Nidorino
pokemon.description: It is easily angered. By swinging its well-developed horn wildly, it can even punch through diamond.

pokemon.name: Nidoking
pokemon.description: It is recognized by its rock-hard hide and its extended horn. Be careful with the horn as it contains venom.

pokemon.name: Clefairy
pokemon.description: Its adorable appearance makes it popular as a pet. However, it is rare and difficult to find.

pokemon.name: Clefable
pokemon.description: It has an acute sense of hearing. It can easily hear a pin being dropped nearly 1,100 yards away.

pokemon.name: Vulpix
pokemon.description: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.

pokemon.name: Ninetales
pokemon.description: It has nine long tails and fur that gleams gold. It is said to live for 1,000 years.

pokemon.name: Jigglypuff
pokemon.description: It captivates foes with its huge, round eyes, then lulls them to sleep by singing a soothing melody.

pokemon.name: Wigglytuff
pokemon.description: Its fur is extremely fine, dense, and supple. The exquisitely pleasant fur conveys an image of luxury.

pokemon.name: Zubat
pokemon.description: It has no eyes. Instead, it relies on its ultrasonic cries for echo location to flit about in darkness.

pokemon.name: Golbat
pokemon.description: It clamps down on its prey with needle-sharp fangs and drains over 10 ounces of blood in one gulp.

pokemon.name: Oddish
pokemon.description: Its scientific name is "Oddium Wanderus." At night, it is said to walk nearly 1,000 feet on its two roots.

pokemon.name: Gloom
pokemon.description: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.

pokemon.name: Vileplume
pokemon.description: Its petals are the largest in the world. It fiendishly scatters allergy-causing pollen from its petals.

pokemon.name: Paras
pokemon.description: Growing out of the bug’s back are mushrooms called tochukaso. The mushrooms grow with the bug host.

pokemon.name: Parasect
pokemon.description: It scatters toxic spores from the mushroom cap. In China, the spores are used as herbal medicine.

pokemon.name: Venonat
pokemon.description: Its eyes act as radar, enabling it to be active in darkness. The eyes can also shoot powerful beams.

pokemon.name: Venomoth
pokemon.description: The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust.

pokemon.name: Diglett
pokemon.description: t burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.

pokemon.name: Dugtrio
pokemon.description: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.

pokemon.name: Meowth
pokemon.description: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

pokemon.name: Persian
pokemon.description: Has a vicious temperament. Beware if it raises its tail straight up. It is a signal that it is about to pounce and bite.

pokemon.name: Psyduck
pokemon.description: It is constantly wracked by a headache. When the headache turns intense, it begins using mysterious powers.

pokemon.name: Golduck
pokemon.description: The forelegs are webbed, helping to make it an adept swimmer. It can be seen swimming elegantly in lakes, etc.

pokemon.name: Mankey
pokemon.description: Light and agile on its feet, and ferocious in temperament. When angered, it flies into an uncontrollable frenzy.

pokemon.name: Primeape
pokemon.description: It is always outrageously furious. If it gives chase, it will tenaciously track the target no matter how far.

pokemon.name: Growlithe
pokemon.description: Very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.

pokemon.name: Arcanine
pokemon.description: A POKéMON that is described in Chinese legends. It is said to race at an unbelievable speed.

pokemon.name: Poliwag
pokemon.description: Its slick black skin is thin and damp. A part of its internal organs can be seen through the skin as a spiral pattern.

pokemon.name: Poliwhirl
pokemon.description: Its two legs are well developed. Even though it can live on the ground, it prefers living in water.

pokemon.name: Poliwrath
pokemon.description: An adept swimmer, it knows the front crawl, butterfly, and more. It is faster than the best human swimmers.

pokemon.name: Abra
pokemon.description: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a variety of extrasensory powers even while asleep.

pokemon.name: Kadabra
pokemon.description: It happened one morning - a boy with extrasensory powers awoke in bed transformed into KADABRA.

pokemon.name: Alakazam
pokemon.description: It does not like physical attacks very much. Instead, it freely uses extrasensory powers to defeat foes.

pokemon.name: Machop
pokemon.description: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

pokemon.name: Machoke
pokemon.description: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.

pokemon.name: Machamp
pokemon.description: Its four ruggedly developed arms can launch a flurry of 1,000 punches in just two seconds.

pokemon.name: Bellsprout
pokemon.description: Its bud looks like a human face. Because of the bud, it is rumored to be a type of legendary mandrake plant.

pokemon.name: Weepinbell
pokemon.description: The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.

pokemon.name: Victreebel
pokemon.description: Lures prey into its mouth with a honeylike aroma. The helpless prey is melted with a dissolving fluid.

pokemon.name: Tentacool
pokemon.description: Its eyes are as transparent as crystals. From them, it shoots mysterious beams of light.

pokemon.name: Tentacruel
pokemon.description: It has 80 tentacles that move about freely. They can sting, causing poisoning and sharp, stabbing pain.

pokemon.name: Geodude
pokemon.description: Its round form makes it easy to pick up. Some people have used them to hurl at each other in a snowball fight.

pokemon.name: Graveler
pokemon.description: Be careful while hiking on mountain trails. GRAVELER may come rolling down the path without slowing.

pokemon.name: Golem
pokemon.description: It is enclosed in a hard shell that is as rugged as slabs of rock. It sheds skin once a year to grow larger.

pokemon.name: Ponyta
pokemon.description: Its body is light, and its legs are incredibly powerful. It can clear Ayers Rock in one leap.

pokemon.name: Rapidash
pokemon.description: It can gallop at a top speed of 150 miles per hour. It can race as fast as a bullet train while ablaze.

pokemon.name: Slowpoke
pokemon.description: It is always vacantly lost in thought, but no one knows what it is thinking about. It is good at fishing with its tail.

pokemon.name: Slowbro
pokemon.description: When a SLOWPOKE went hunting in the sea, its tail was bitten by a SHELLDER. That made it evolve into SLOWBRO.

pokemon.name: Magnemite
pokemon.description: It moves while constantly hovering. It discharges THUNDER WAVE and so on from the units at its sides.

pokemon.name: Magneton
pokemon.description: A linked cluster formed of several MAGNEMITE. It discharges powerful magnetic waves at high voltage.

pokemon.name: Farfetch'd
pokemon.description: It always walks about with a plant stalk clamped in its beak. The stalk is used for building its nest.

pokemon.name: Doduo
pokemon.description: A two-headed POKéMON that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.

pokemon.name: Dodrio
pokemon.description: An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger.

pokemon.name: Seel
pokemon.description: Covered with light blue fur, its hide is thick and tough. It is active in bitter cold of minus 40 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: Dewgong
pokemon.description: Its body is covered with a pure white fur. The colder the weather, the more active it becomes.

pokemon.name: Grimer
pokemon.description: Sludge exposed to X rays from the moon transformed into GRIMER. It loves feeding on filthy things.

pokemon.name: Muk
pokemon.description: It is usually undetectable because it blends in with the ground. Touching it can cause terrible poisoning.

pokemon.name: Shellder
pokemon.description: It is encased in a shell that is harder than diamond. Inside, however, it is surprisingly tender.

pokemon.name: Cloyster
pokemon.description: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.description: A being that exists as a thin gas. It can topple an Indian elephant by enveloping the prey in two seconds.

pokemon.name: Haunter
pokemon.description: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, HAUNTER is there.

pokemon.name: Gengar
pokemon.description: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.

pokemon.name: Onix
pokemon.description: It usually lives underground. It searches for food while boring its way through the ground at 50 miles per hour.

pokemon.name: Drowzee
pokemon.description: A descendent of the legendary animal baku, which is said to eat dreams. It is skilled at hypnotism.

pokemon.name: Hypno
pokemon.description: It carries a pendulum-like device. There once was an incident in which it took away a child it hypnotized.

pokemon.name: Krabby
pokemon.description: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

pokemon.name: Kingler
pokemon.description: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

pokemon.name: Voltorb
pokemon.description: A life-form whose identity is unknown. It is said to SCREECH or suddenly SELFDESTRUCT.

pokemon.name: Electrode
pokemon.description: It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of "The Bomb Ball."

pokemon.name: Exeggcute
pokemon.description: Even though it appears to be eggs of some sort, it was discovered to be a life-form more like plant seeds.

pokemon.name: Exeggutor
pokemon.description: It is called "The Walking Tropical Rainforest." Each of the nuts has a face and a will of its own.

pokemon.name: Cubone
pokemon.description: It wears the skull of its dead mother on its head. When it becomes lonesome, it is said to cry loudly.

pokemon.name: Marowak
pokemon.description: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.

pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
pokemon.description: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.

pokemon.name: Hitmonchan
pokemon.description: The spirit of a pro boxer has infused this POKéMON. It throws punches that are faster than a bullet train.

pokemon.name: Lickitung
pokemon.description: Its tongue is twice the length of its body. It can be moved like an arm for grabbing food and attacking.

pokemon.name: Koffing
pokemon.description: Its thin, balloon-like body is inflated by horribly toxic gases. It reeks when it is nearby.

pokemon.name: Weezing
pokemon.description: Very rarely, a sudden mutation can result in two small KOFFING twins becoming conjoined as a WEEZING.

pokemon.name: Rhyhorn
pokemon.description: Strong, but not too bright, this POKéMON can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging TACKLES.

pokemon.name: Rhydon
pokemon.description: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

pokemon.name: Chansey
pokemon.description: It lays several eggs a day. The eggs are apparently rich in nutrients and extremely delicious.

pokemon.name: Tangela
pokemon.description: Blue plant vines cloak the POKéMON’s identity in a tangled mass. It entangles anything that gets close.

pokemon.name: Kangaskhan
pokemon.description: The female raises its offspring in a pouch on its belly. It is skilled at attacking using COMET PUNCH.

pokemon.name: Horsea
pokemon.description: It maintains balance using its tail, which is wound up like a coil. It may spray ink from its mouth.

pokemon.name: Seadra
pokemon.description: Its body bristles with sharp spikes. Carelessly trying to touch it could cause fainting from the spikes.

pokemon.name: Goldeen
pokemon.description: Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.

pokemon.name: Seaking
pokemon.description: The horn on its head is sharp like a drill. It bores a hole in a boulder to make its nest.

pokemon.name: Staryu
pokemon.description: It appears in large numbers by seashores. At night, its central core flashes with a red light.

pokemon.name: Starmie
pokemon.description: This POKéMON has a geometric body. Because of its body, the locals suspect that it is an alien creature.

pokemon.name: Mr. Mime
pokemon.description: It is adept at conning people. It is said to be able to create walls out of thin air by miming.

pokemon.name: Scyther
pokemon.description: It tears and shreds prey with its wickedly sharp scythes. It very rarely spreads its wings to fly.

pokemon.name: Jynx
pokemon.description: It speaks using a language that sounds human. Research is under way to determine what is being said.

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.description: It loves to feed on strong electricity. It occasionally appears around large power plants and so on.

pokemon.name: Magmar
pokemon.description: Found near the mouth of a volcano. This fire-breather’s body temperature is nearly 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: Pinsir
pokemon.description: Its two long pincer horns are powerful. Once they grip an enemy, they won’t release until the foe is torn.

pokemon.name: Tauros
pokemon.description: When it is about to TACKLE, it whips its body repeatedly with its three long tails.

pokemon.name: Magikarp
pokemon.description: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic POKéMON in the world.

pokemon.name: Gyarados
pokemon.description: It has an extremely aggressive nature. The HYPER BEAM it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets.

pokemon.name: Lapras
pokemon.description: Its high intelligence enables it to understand human speech. It likes to ferry people on its back.

pokemon.name: Ditto
pokemon.description: It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life-forms.

pokemon.name: Eevee
pokemon.description: An extremely rare POKéMON that may evolve in a number of different ways depending on stimuli.

pokemon.name: Vaporeon
pokemon.description: Its body’s cellular structure is similar to the molecular composition of water. It can melt invisibly in water.

pokemon.name: Jolteon
pokemon.description: If it is angered or startled, the fur all over its body bristles like sharp needles that pierce foes.

pokemon.name: Flareon
pokemon.description: It has a flame bag inside its body. After inhaling deeply, it blows out flames of nearly 3,100 degrees Fahrenheit.

pokemon.name: Porygon
pokemon.description: Using the most advanced technologies, scientists finally succeeded in making the first artificial POKéMON.

pokemon.name: Omanyte
pokemon.description: A prehistoric POKéMON that lived in the primordial sea, it swims by twisting its 10 tentacles about.

pokemon.name: Omastar
pokemon.description: Its tentacles are highly developed as if they are hands and feet. As soon as it ensnares prey, it bites.

pokemon.name: Kabuto
pokemon.description: This POKéMON was regenerated from the fossil of an ancient creature. It protects itself with a hard shell.

pokemon.name: Kabutops
pokemon.description: It swims freely through water. It catches prey with its scythe-like arms and drains the victim’s fluids.

pokemon.name: Aerodactyl
pokemon.description: It was regenerated from a dinosaur’s genetic matter that was found in amber. It flies with high-pitched cries.

pokemon.name: Snorlax
pokemon.description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

pokemon.name: Articuno
pokemon.description: One of the legendary bird POKéMON. With its long tail trailing behind, its flying form is magnificent.

pokemon.name: Zapdos
pokemon.description: One of the legendary bird POKéMON. While it is flying, it makes crackling and snapping sounds.

pokemon.name: Moltres
pokemon.description: One of the legendary bird POKéMON. Those seeing it are overwhelmed by its orange wings that seem to be on fire.

pokemon.name: Dratini
pokemon.description: Even the young can exceed 6.5 feet in length. It grows larger by repeatedly shedding skin.

pokemon.name: Dragonair
pokemon.description: It is said to live in seas and lakes. Even though it has no wings, it has been seen flying occasionally.

pokemon.name: Dragonite
pokemon.description: It can fly in spite of its big and bulky physique. It circles the globe in just 16 hours.

pokemon.name: Mewtwo
pokemon.description: A POKéMON whose genetic code was repeatedly recombined for research. It turned vicious as a result.

pokemon.name: Mew
pokemon.description: A POKéMON of South America that was thought to have been extinct. It is very intelligent and learns any move.
